name: I Eat Dreams As a Living
name_original: I Eat Dreams As a Living
description:
A realism and hyper-realism game about dreaming. Made in 3 days.

#IMPORTANT:

If you think the game hits some strange corner, RESTART, SAVE, LOAD are always your friend!

---

"That human called Descarte was right––There is no deception of any form in dreams. My ancestry is a dream biter, and they know it well.

At the last moment before a dream biter dies, they give birth to the predecessor and deliver all knowledge possible. And I am born this moment."

---

Creators

Angel Cui (narrative designer)

Jun Zhou (narrative designer, artist)

Hannah Zeng (narrative designer, system designer)

...and MIDJOURNEY (main artist)
